overview: A Northern Territory policeman, is given the job of taking an Aboriginal prisoner Emu Foot, to Alice Springs to be tried for a tribal killing.  Bayard is wounded during a revenge attack by tribesmen, and Emu Foot helps him get to a remote cattle station.  But there Bayard gets involved in a domestic crisis involving Julie Kirkbride, the neurotic, bored wife of the station owner, and is tempted by the head stockman's daughter Chris Palady.
title: Dust in the Sun
